text: Hey Team, we are planning to push multiple versions of app, starting with a simpler version to start with, What are the requirements to recertify the app before we release updates ?
mostly thinking we stay in compliance and kind of wondering how adding new scopes in future release handled.
If you add new scopes the users will have to go through the install flow again, so that you can get a new token with the updated scopes.
is that what you meant by “recertify”
i mean we are adding new scopes in later version and also plan to push custom objects
so do we need to recertify with marketplace again and I take it the clients need to reinstall the app.

as carter said, new scopes = new auth with end user.
as far as the marketplace goes, i will ask if what that looks like

Hi guys, we want to update a custom workflow action in our listed marketplace app. When updating the action url is the update directly pushed to all portals that are using the custom workflow action or are they using a revisioned version from that point and only new installs are using the updated action url? Thanks in advance for your help!
